text: CLOSE It's that time of year when we celebrate the best series television has to offer. Here are the Emmy nominees for this year's outstanding drama series. USA TODAY Elisabeth Moss as June on ` ` The Handmaid's Tale.'' ( Photo : George Kraychyk / Hulu ) Will the Emmys be dominated by white walkers or handmaids? That's the biggest question on TV fans'minds heading into the 70th Primetime Emmy Awards Monday ( NBC, 8 EDT / 5 PDT ).
